类 org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.ORMapInfo
的使用

  • 使用ORMapInfo的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.cyy.fw.android.dborm  
    org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite
    Provide the SQLite ORM scheme and DB Access API, Expose the SqliteDBFacade for users
    User need to extend it and do a few things more: (1).Name the DB, android will create the specified DB file in the databases folder of the application (2).Implement the configureORMClasses() method, configure all mapped POJO classes, the DB will create tables according to this configured classes

    • org.cyy.fw.android.dborm中ORMapInfo的使用

      返回ORMapInfo的org.cyy.fw.android.dborm中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ORMapInfo[] AbstractORMapper.generateAllTableColumnMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz) 
      ORMapInfo[] ORMapper.generateAllTableColumnMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      generate all the O-R mapping information
      One POJO class may be mapped to several tables
      ORMapInfo AbstractORMapper.generateColumnMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz) 
      ORMapInfo ORMapper.generateColumnMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      已过时。 
      It's suggested to use ORMapper.generateColumnMap(Class, String) instead
      ORMapInfo AbstractORMapper.generateColumnMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String tableName) 
      ORMapInfo ORMapper.generateColumnMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.lang.String tableName)
      generate mapping info of specified table
      static ORMapInfo ORMUtil.getOrMapInfo(ORMapper orMapper, java.lang.Class<?> clazz, java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.String> tableMap)
      Obtain the O-R mapping info of the specified POJO class
      参数类型为ORMapInfo的org.cyy.fw.android.dborm中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.Object ORMUtil.getPkValue(java.lang.Object value, ORMapInfo mapInfo)
      Obtain the primary key value of POJO
      static java.lang.String[] ORMUtil.mappingColumnByField(java.lang.String[] fields, ORMapInfo mapInfo)
      mapping attributes to columns
